products.name: Butter Chicken
products.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce with butter and Indian spices.

products.name: Chicken Biryani
products.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with succulent chicken pieces, aromatic spices, and garnished with fried onions and fresh coriander.

products.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
products.description: Cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) marinated in spices, grilled, and then cooked in a flavorful tomato-based curry.

products.name: Dal Makhani
products.description: A rich and creamy lentil dish made with black lentils, kidney beans, butter, and Indian spices.

products.name: Dosa
products.description: Thin, crispy rice crepes served with coconut chutney and tangy sambar (lentil soup).

products.name: Idli-Vada Combo
products.description: Soft and fluffy steamed rice cakes (idli) served with fried lentil donuts (vada) and accompanied by coconut chutney and sambar.

products.name: Chicken Chettinad
products.description: A spicy and flavorful chicken curry with roots in the Chettinad region of South India, known for its bold use of spices.

products.name: Pani Puri
products.description: Crispy hollow puris filled with a mixture of spicy, tangy tamarind water, mashed potatoes, and chickpeas.

products.name: Bhel Puri
products.description: A delightful street food snack made with puffed rice, sev, chopped vegetables, and tangy chutneys.

products.name: Gulab Jamun
products.description: Soft and spongy milk solids balls soaked in sugar syrup, garnished with pistachios or almonds.

products.name: Rasgulla
products.description: Spongy cottage cheese balls soaked in light sugar syrup, making them a delightful and refreshing dessert.
